Rulings.Tengu:
●If the number of monsters on the field is reduced below 4 after activation of Needle Ceiling (by chaining Ring of Destruction, etc.), the effect of Needle Ceiling still resolves (see Activation & Targeting Eligibility on the Advanced FAQ).
●Face-down monsters and Monster Tokens are included in determining the number of monsters on the field.

Rulings.Base: 1. If the number of monsters on the field is reduced below 4 after activation of "Needle Ceiling" (by chaining "Ring of Destruction", etc.), the effect of "Needle Ceiling" still resolves (see "Activation & Targeting Eligibility" on the Advanced FAQ).\n2. Face-down monsters and Monster Tokens are included in determining the number of monsters on the field.
